response.original_title: Why can't I access my Kraken account? GUIDE!
response.overview: The reasons you ⟦+1⟧⇢(307)⇢⊹(256)⊹8902 cannot access your Kraken account generally fall into one of two main categories: security measures or technical/user error. A common ⟦+1⟧⇢(307)⇢⊹(256)⊹8902 cause is simply entering the wrong password or Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) code multiple times, which automatically triggers a temporary lock-out for security. Another significant ⟦+1⟧⇢(307)⇢⊹(256)⊹8902 factor is a security hold or suspension placed by Kraken's automated system if it detects unusual login attempts, access from a new device, or suspicious activity on your account. Less common ⟦+1⟧⇢(307)⇢⊹(256)⊹8902 reasons include regulatory or compliance reviews, failure to provide updated verification documents upon request, or a violation of Kraken's Terms of Service. If you are ⟦+1⟧⇢(307)⇢⊹(256)⊹8902 locked out due to a lost 2FA device or password, Kraken's support center offers a dedicated recovery process you must follow.
